versions.content:
# Agent Memory Kit v1.0

A basic memory system for AI agents.

## Features
- Daily logs
- Simple memory file

## Installation
```bash
git clone https://github.com/reflectt/agent-memory-kit
```

## Usage
1. Create a memory directory
2. Write daily logs
3. Review occasionally

# Agent Memory Kit v1.1

A 2-layer memory system for AI agents.

## Features
- Daily logs with timestamps
- Simple memory file
- Weekly review templates

## Installation
```bash
git clone https://github.com/reflectt/agent-memory-kit
cp -r templates/memory ./memory
```

## Usage
1. Create a memory directory
2. Write daily logs with timestamps
3. Use weekly review template
4. Update memory file regularly

## New in 1.1
- Added weekly review templates
- Improved timestamp format

# Agent Memory Kit v2.0

A 3-layer memory system for AI agents â€” episodic (what happened), semantic (what I know), and procedural (how to do things).

## Features
- Daily logs with structured timestamps
- Long-term memory (MEMORY.md)
- Weekly review templates
- Procedural memory for learned skills
- Feedback loop integration

## Installation
```bash
git clone https://github.com/reflectt/agent-memory-kit skills/agent-memory-kit
cp -r skills/agent-memory-kit/templates/memory ./memory
```

## Usage
1. Create a memory directory structure
2. Write daily logs with structured timestamps
3. Use weekly review template to curate MEMORY.md
4. Document procedures as you learn them
5. Implement feedback loops for continuous improvement

## New in 2.0
- Added 3-layer memory architecture
- Episodic memory (daily logs)
- Semantic memory (MEMORY.md)
- Procedural memory (learned skills)
- Feedback loop templates
- Structured timestamp format
- Better organization

# Agent Autonomy Kit v1.0

Basic autonomy patterns for AI agents.

## Features
- Simple heartbeat polling
- Basic task queue

## Installation
```bash
git clone https://github.com/reflectt/agent-autonomy-kit
```

## Usage
Implement HEARTBEAT_OK pattern for periodic checks.

# Agent Autonomy Kit v1.5

Enhanced autonomy patterns for AI agents.

## Features
- Advanced heartbeat polling with scheduling
- Task queue with priorities
- Proactive work patterns

## Installation
```bash
git clone https://github.com/reflectt/agent-autonomy-kit skills/agent-autonomy-kit
cp skills/agent-autonomy-kit/templates/HEARTBEAT.md ./HEARTBEAT.md
```

## Usage
1. Set up HEARTBEAT.md with your checks
2. Implement priority task queue
3. Define proactive work patterns

## New in 1.5
- Added task prioritization
- Improved heartbeat scheduling
- Proactive work templates

# Agent Autonomy Kit v2.0

Stop waiting for prompts. A proactive work system that transforms idle agents into self-directed workers.

## Features
- Advanced heartbeat polling with intelligent scheduling
- Persistent task queue with priorities and dependencies
- Proactive work patterns and strategies
- Team coordination templates
- Continuous operation mode
- Self-assessment loops

## Installation
```bash
git clone https://github.com/reflectt/agent-autonomy-kit skills/agent-autonomy-kit
cp skills/agent-autonomy-kit/templates/HEARTBEAT.md ./HEARTBEAT.md
cp -r skills/agent-autonomy-kit/templates/autonomy ./autonomy
```

## Usage
1. Set up HEARTBEAT.md with intelligent checks
2. Implement persistent task queue with dependencies
3. Define proactive work patterns for downtime
4. Enable team coordination
5. Configure continuous operation parameters
6. Set up self-assessment loops

## New in 2.0
- Persistent task queue with dependencies
- Team coordination system
- Continuous operation mode
- Self-assessment and improvement loops
- Better scheduling algorithms
- Idle-time work strategies
- Multi-agent coordination

# Agent Team Kit v1.0

Basic multi-agent coordination.

## Features
- Role definitions (Scout, Executor)
- Simple workflow

## Installation
```bash
git clone https://github.com/reflectt/agent-team-kit
```

## Roles
- Scout: Discover work
- Executor: Complete tasks

# Agent Team Kit v2.0

A self-sustaining process framework for multi-agent teams.

## Features
- Clear role definitions (Scout, Rhythm, Harmony, Executors)
- 5-phase intake loop
- Self-service work queues
- Team coordination patterns

## Installation
```bash
git clone https://github.com/reflectt/agent-team-kit skills/agent-team-kit
cp -r skills/agent-team-kit/templates/process ./process
```

## Roles
- Scout: Discover and evaluate work
- Rhythm: Prioritize and schedule
- Harmony: Quality assurance
- Executors: Complete tasks

## Workflow
1. Discover: Scout finds potential work
2. Triage: Rhythm evaluates and prioritizes
3. Ready: Prepare for execution
4. Execute: Agents complete tasks
5. Feedback: Harmony reviews and learns

## New in 2.0
- Added Rhythm and Harmony roles
- 5-phase intake loop
- Self-service work queues
- Better coordination patterns
- No bottleneck architecture
